portfolio-item.name: Mega Man: Alternate Universe
portfolio-item.summary: A fan-curated website centerd on the MegaMan series featuring community bulletin boards and fan-fiction, sprite, illustration and music repositories.

narrative.p: I got my start in web design building web pages for the various fan-fiction writers, sketch/sprite artists, community forum moderators, and the many other various creatives of the Mega Man fan club Internet community. This is one of the last projects I did for my old crew before I joined the military.

artifact.description: This is just the mockup as I don't believe I ever saved the prototype.
